CONTENT_ITEM.CONTENT_VAR: Major changes in API and streamlining in preparation for 1.0 beta release. Introduced <PKIT_*>, <MODEL_*> and <VIEW_*> tags. Templates get pre-parsed and cached using file_cache option of HTML::Template.

Replaced Apache::PageKit::Info with Apache::PageKit::Config and Apache::PageKit::Content. Better support for language localization. Reorganization of files into Model, View, Content, and Controller Directories. Improved test suite to use Apache::test to run and test working copy of pagekit.org site.
